nodes.text: Force Orb was a Force power which served as an attack. Through the manifestion of the force an Orb was created of pure Force energy that obstructed the surrounding environment. Under normal circumstances, it only worked underwater.
Kit Fisto utilized it during the Battle of Mon Calamari, creating a ball of air underwater and directing it through the legs of a Quarren artillery cannon, disabling it.

During the Battle of Mon Cala, Kit Fisto and Anakin Skywalker attempted to use this power to make a makeshift air helmet for Padmé Amidala to breathe when Riff Tamson broke her helmet spitefully with his jaws. They succeeded, but Jar Jar Binks's Gungan saliva proved a more effective seal.
